name: Phrogkey
description:
Ever wanted to conduct a small choir of frogs? Now's your chance! Just click on the frogs or press the number keys to start playing.

Controls:

  • Keyboard: 1-8
  • Mouse: Click on frogs

Possible Future Improvements:

Don't hold your breath, but I might add this stuff later.

  • Better frog sounds
    • Holding notes will sound nice and smooth rather than a nasty loop
  • Multi-colored frogs
    • Hear the rainbow
  • More sound range
    • Be able to play more songs
  • Different weather
    • Frogs need some rain now and then
  • Customizable frog colors
    • Random colors are nice, but some people like order
  • Playable song programs
    • Why play songs when you can have the game read and play them for you!
    • Start with some default sample songs
    • Later add player writable songs
  • Hats
    • Hats
  • Story mode
  • PvP Battle Royal mode

Known Bugs:

  • Android version has very long input lag for some reason. It could just be on my phone, though.
  • If a frog is pressed too quickly, sometimes the note is held after clicking
  • In the web version, if you move to another tab and then return, the keyboard may no longer work
  • The text is barely legible on credits screen and buttons
  • The mouse cursor is a bug
